mapper.select: select count(t_category_id) from codeworld_category_attribute where t_category_id = #{categoryId}
select distinct cc.t_category_name AS categoryName, cca.t_category_id AS categoryId from codeworld_category_attribute AS cca left join codeworld_category AS cc on cca.t_category_id = cc.t_category_id
mapper.insert: insert into codeworld_category_attribute (t_category_attribute_id, t_category_id, t_attribute_id, t_create_time, t_update_time) values ( #{id}, #{categoryId}, #{attributeId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} );
